title: Delightful 1 bed / 1 bath in Lithonia. 916 Sq Ft. Great value!
posting_body: ['-- Walden Brook --', 'show contact info', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1455', 'Apartment:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bathroom', 'Square Footage:', '916 sq ft', "The living spaces at Gardenwood Apartments are thoughtfully designed for comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other rental apartments in College Park.", 'Pet Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'Check out our beautiful community featuring:', '➢ BBQ/Picnic Area', '➢ Clubhouse', '➢ Courtyard', '➢ Gameroom', '➢ Laundry Facility', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Multi Use Room', '➢ Playground', '➢ Porch', '➢ Sprinkler System', '➢ Car Care Center', '➢ Controlled Access', '➢ Detached garages', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Planned Social Activities', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Sundeck', '➢ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', 'Apartment features include:', '➢ Air Conditioning', '➢ Ceiling Fans', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Extra Storage', '➢ Office', '➢ Oven', '➢ Patio or Balcony', '➢ Range', '➢ Refrigerator/Freezer', '➢ Window Coverings', '➢ 9 foot ceiling', '➢ Built in computer niches', '➢ Crown Molding', '➢ Fully equipped modern kitchens', '➢ High Speed Internet Access', '➢ Large walk-in closets', '➢ Spacious 1, 2 & 3 Bedrooms', '➢ Storage Space', '➢ Upgrade Unit', '➢ Walk-In Closets', 'Phone:', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', '100 Walden Brook Drive', 'Lithonia, GA 30038', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month', 'Managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'AB126FF1458D4D']
